pages.text: The $(mob)Azure Cicaptera$() is an animal found in $(thing)Plains$(). Like other Cicapteras, it wanders around and flees when hit. Its meat is a decent source of food although it can be hard to catch and to kill due to its shell.$(p)It can be bred with $(item)Seeds$(), and can bred with any other Cicaptera.
$(mob)Azure Cicapteras$() drop $(item)Azure Cicaptera Husks$() on death. It is used as a blue dye, and as such is used to paint various items blue, like $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Wool$().
